Description: ¿Quieres vivir una experiencia diferente, divertida y colorida?¡Pues imagina! Nada más llegar nuestro equipo compartirá su experiencia contigo para que elijas tu rutina facial perfecta. Una vez te hayas decidido, te guiaremos paso a paso para aplicar los productos, haciéndolo fácil y divertido para enseñarte en qué consiste una rutina facial y dar un respiro a la piel. ¡Pero eso no es todo! Después, nos sumergiremos en la diversión con un taller en el que podrás hacer tu propia limpiadora facial. Y lo mejor, ¡te la llevarás a casa para seguir disfrutando de esta experiencia maravillosa en la calidez de tu hogar! Pero las sorpresas no se detienen ahí. A continuación podrás elegir uno de nuestos productos exclusivos "party" y llevártelo a casa. Estos productos están reservados para aquellas personas que visitan nuestras fiestas. ¡Presume de estos artículos exclusivos que no encontrarás en nuestras tiendas! Este evento es ideal para compartir con amigos, familia o incluso esa primera cita romántica. Imagina disfrutar de un momento de relajación y diversión, ¡todo esto en el corazón de Bilbao! ¿Te animas a ser parte de esta experiencia única?

Description: Play a thrilling city exploration game and uncover the secrets of the Casco Viejo of Bilbao, the beating heart of the city! On your quest in search of the missing Maestro of the Bilbao Orchestra, you'll wander through historic alleys, step on bridges full of legends, and solve challenges to discover iconic and hidden treasures of Bilbao's Old Town. Are you ready for a mysterious adventure? The route you’re going to follow in the city is sprinkled with unique places, fun clues and challenges, and incredible stories. The experience will play out like you’re the main characters of a movie, only that you’re experiencing everything in first person! Fun dialogue, intrigue, and unexpected interactions are guaranteed. HOW IT WORKS❓ 1. Book your tickets 🎫 2. Download the Questo app - it's free 📲 3. Head to the starting point📍 WHAT YOU’LL DO The game is an interactive activity where you are guided by a mobile app through the city. With it, you follow directions and solve very fun puzzles, riddles, and cryptic codes. During the game, you will also visit popular and hidden places in the city while learning fun (and we mean it) stories about them. This is a storytelling experience just as much. The people doing these city exploration games gave them an average rating of 4.7/5 around the world. Join the playground too! ------------------ More about Questo 🚶‍♀️ Questo is an urban entertainment platform offering thematic real-world exploration games. It is currently available in over 150 cities 🌎 and has entertained hundreds of thousands of players already. Title: Mysterious Bilbao Outdoor Escape Game: Secrets of Casco Viejo
Subtitle: Follow clues, solve puzzles, discover new places and learn incredible stories of the city's past and present during this city adventure.

Description: Awaken your mind and body to a new level and learn how to practice meditation in motion. The purpose of this yoga lineage is to guide you toward cultivating a conscious connection, integration and awakening of the body, mind, heart and spirit. You will learn and practice Patanjali's 8 limbs of yoga: Work primarily with the Amrit posture sequence, gentle vinyasa flows and extended posture holding times. Explore the deepest levels of body, mind and spirit with the integrative practices of clear intention, breath, meditative awareness and conscious integration. Learn to balance your nervous system with the “first half” and “second half” of a posture. To transition from an active state of “doing” a posture, to a relaxed state of “being”. And to feel the effects of a posture. Learn to consciously encounter your "edge" of body and mind to release deep tensions and restore the natural flow of the vital life force energy (prana). Good for all levels, from those with some experience to more experienced practitioners. Some experience with yoga and postures is recommended. BIOGRAPHY I have been guiding spiritual seekers for over 30 years with the self-transformative teachings of yoga, meditation, Ayurveda and breathing. It is my pleasure and honor to guide you toward self-empowerment, transformation and awakened consciousness. I will help you connect to your deepest self and inner guide, from the physical to the soul dimension. SOULDIMENSION.ORG Copyright © 2022 • Soul Dimension
Title: Awakening Yoga • Weekly Class • Bilbao
Subtitle: Weekly online class with a spiritual focus to awaken one’s consciousness and highest potential.

Refund_Policy: Contact the organizer to request a refund.
Description:
Dinner and a movie are soooo last decade. Instead, you play a city exploration game along the charming ría of Bilbao and fall in love with the city while discovering fun facts of both famous and hidden gems transformed by love.  Solve exciting riddles and puzzles to unlock the most romantic words in Euskera, the oldest living language in Europe, whose origins remain a mystery. Are you ready to travel The Way of Love? Maitemindu! We are inviting you two (or you three - hey, we don’t judge!) to a romantic couples activity that’s part outdoor escape room, part scavenger hunt and part walking tour.  We promise this experience will make you want to kiss and tell <3. We’ve hosted more than 20.000 dates this year. So, we’re pretty sure you will absolutely love it too!  If you don’t, let us know and we’ll live the rest of our lives in shame. So, we’re pretty sure you will absolutely love it too!  But if you don’t, let us know and we’ll live the rest of our lives in shame. WHAT WILL YOU DO❓ - Stroll through the Doña Casilda Park, one of the most romantic parks in Spain, and wander along the ría of Bilbao.
 - Discover the magical artworks outside the Guggenheim Museum, a jewel of art and architecture.
 - Learn 10 words of love in Euskera, the Basque language. You'll be surprised by how lovely their meanings are! HOW DOES IT WORK❓ The entire experience is delivered through a mobile app. 1. Book your tickets 🎫. 2. Get the instructions via email. 3. Download the Questo mobile app (as instructed via email) and head to the starting point on any day that you choose📍. 4﻿. Invite your significant one. FEATURES ✔️ - Available 24/7. - Pause and resume anytime. - Private. -﻿ A bunch of cute & instagrammable places. WHEN CAN YOU TRY THIS EXPERIENCE❓ - date night - anniversary - birthday celebration - holiday date - Valentine’s Day - as a gift for any occasion A﻿GE RECOMMENDATION If you have little ones and want to bring them along with you, feel free to do so, this experience is kid friendly.
Title: Romantic Bilbao: Cute Scavenger Hunt for Couples
Subtitle: Surprise your lover with a cute & exciting date while discovering fun facts of both famous and hidden gems along the charming ría of Bilbao!

Description: This experience will allow you to develop a beautiful relationship with the oldest area of San Sebastián. Through its history and its most important spaces, you will be able to understand why it was almost entirely destroyed and what happened afterwards. The area, filled with buildings built more than a hundred years ago, right alongside newer constructions, seamlessly combines both the modern and the historical. The route you’re going to follow in the city is sprinkled with unique places, fun clues and challenges, and incredible stories of past and present. Description: Play a city exploration game and discover the beautiful downtown area of San Sebastian. Along the way, you'll uncover the history behind the neighborhood's continuing popularity. Explore parks and buildings created over a century ago with both British and French inspiration, giving the city its unique stately style. Wander through the charming and picturesque town, basking in the rich history of its culture and for a moment become part of that special feeling that is San Sebastian. Description: You have a glorious opportunity to get your message into the world. Never before has there been such an exciting time in communication. The ability to transmit your words across the world has existed for decades. What has changed a result of COVID-19 is now people are LISTENING. Virtual communication has now been accepted as the norm. People know that they need to tune into the Facebook Lives and join the Zoom meetings otherwise they are going to be left out of the loop. They are ready to hear your message. Are you ready to give it to them? Your phone and your computer are all you need to make a difference in the world. You have a voice, it’s time to use it. You have a story, it’s time to tell it. You have a message, it’s time to share it. Imagine being able to reach people in places you’ve never heard of and changing the lives of people you have never met. That possibility is more real than ever thanks to virtual speaking. You still aren’t 100% sure about all this, are you? You’ve done some Facebook Lives, you’ve been in some Zoom meetings and you’ve filmed a few selfie videos. You’re trying things out, but you’re not as confident as you’d like to be. It still feels weird not being able to see people. You still feel self conscious seeing yourself on camera. You aren’t getting the likes and comments that you see other people getting on their lives and videos. Does it feel like you’ve been left behind by all this change? You haven’t been left behind yet…but you will if you don’t act now. When the technology arrived to do virtual speaking, only a tiny fraction of people adopted it. During the 2010s they rose to the top of their fields. The “second wave” is now here, and you’ve got to catch it if you want to have a meaningful impact during the 2020s. I joined the second wave late. I started my Youtube channel in 2015, 10 years after Youtube had been created. I first used Zoom in 2018, 5 years after Zoom had been created. I was quicker on the uptake with Facebook Live, being one of the first people in my industry to use it in 2016. I didn’t have the audience nor the engagement of my peers, but I kept learning the craft. When lockdown hit in 2020, I was able to seamlessly transition my business online. I’d been preparing for half a decade to speak virtually whilst the competition got caught with their pants down. I managed to grow my audience and increase my income in 2020 when so many businesses struggled or even sadly closed up shop. There’s one thing that made the difference for me and it will make the difference for you too. I knew how to communicate online. I was far more confident with the tech, more practiced in the communication and more open to the switch to virtual. We still have people who don’t know how to unmute themselves on Zoom. We still have people who speak like an emotionless robot on their Youtube videos. We still have people who think virtual was just a “phase” and not a transition into a new way of doing things. Don’t be one of those people. The second wave of virtual communication is here...are you going to jump on it? This is going to be far bigger than the first wave. If you don’t jump on now, you will get swept away. Equally, if you put in the work now to master virtual speaking, you are going to flourish for the next decade. That is what this Virtual Speaking Masterclass is going to help you do. There are three basic building blocks you need to be a great virtual speaker. Firstly you will learn how to make friends with the camera. Making friends with the camera means that you will: Secondly you will learn why it’s so important to create an “active window”. An active window means that you: Thirdly you will learn how to effectively interact with your audience. Strong interaction means that your audience will: Are you ready for the second wave? Then grab your surfboard and sign up for the masterclass! In the true spirit of Virtual Speaking, we will of course be hosting this class virtually so that you can join us from the comfort of your own home. FAQs Is this definitely an online event? Because the event has a physical location? Yes this is entirely online. The physical location allows people in your city (such as you!) to find the event as it shows up as being geographically close to them. Where can I access the masterclass? You can attend the masterclass live on Zoom. You will be sent the link on the day of the masterclass. The event repeats each month, do I need to attend on a monthly basis? No. The same series is repeated every month. You only need to attend one event.
Title: Virtual Speaking Masterclass Bilbao
Subtitle: Online Workshop Teaching You How To Speak Online!

Description: Afin de payer le montant de l'événement (750€) sans frais supplementaires, veuillez nous contacter directement: Antoine Remazeilles: antoineR@neurochangesolutions.com, 06 42 34 40 51 Dr Joe Dispenza: CHANGE YOUR MIND... CREATE NEW RESULTS - CHANGEZ VOS HABITUDES … CRÉEZ VOTRE RÉUSSITE Dans un univers où le changement et l'innovation sont nécessaires pour s'épanouir et prospérer, les questions sont : comment pouvons-nous penser différemment et comment pouvons-nous évoluer ? En se fondant sur les dernières avancées dans le domaine de la neuroscience du changement, Agnès GLAISE et Antoine REMAZEILLES vous transmettent les informations et les outils nécessaires pour initier votre propre évolution ainsi que celle de vos proches. Ce workshop de 2 jours est basé sur les résultats de recherches innovantes et les avancées du Dr Joe Dispenza dans le domaine de la transformation personnelle. En intégrant les principes de base de la neuroplasticité et du comportement humain, chaque personne peut alors créer de réels changements dans sa vie pour permettre de surmonter certains des challenges personnels et professionnels les plus complexes. Fort de ces outils, chacun devient plus épanoui à tous les niveaux. Lors de ce séminaire, Agnès et Antoine vous transmettront une méthodologie basée sur les neurosciences et l'intelligence émotionnelle pour produire des résultats concrets. Ainsi, chaque participant pourra initier des changements positifs et mener sa vie avec plus des comportements plus appropriés. CHANGEZ VOS HABITUDES … CRÉEZ VOTRE RÉUSSITE est le seul programme international destiné aux personnes qui veulent opérer un changement durable, conçu par le Dr.Joe Dispenza. Ce séminaire interactif vous accompagne à travers un processus personnalisé en utilisant les modèles et outils du Dr.Joe Dispenza pour changer votre état d’esprit et créer les résultats souhaités. En participant à cet événement, nous encourageons chaque personne à partager ses plus grands challenges et habitudes qu’elle souhaite changer. Au cours de ce séminaire, vous apprendrez comment modifier votre état d’esprit afin de vous accompagner efficacement vers la réussite. Chaque participant à ce séminaire recevra : Le livret de travail SE LIBÉRER DE SES HABITUDES … POUR RÉUSSIR réalisé par le Dr. Joe Dispenza. Le Journal du Génie des 30 jours SE LIBÉRER DE SES HABITUDES … POUR RÉUSSIR, un guide puissant à utiliser au cours des 30 jours suivant le séminaire. Les fichiers audios de toutes les vidéos du Dr. Joe Dispenza montrées pendant le séminaire. Une version longue et une version courte de la méditation pratiquée durant le séminaire, à usage personnel. (Merci de noter que ces livrets et méditations ne sont pas en vente publique). Parmi les enseignements dispensés à travers ce séminaire, vous découvrirez: Quelle est la nature du changement, Comment mettre en pratique une formule simple pour initier des changements durables, concrets et efficaces dans votre vie, Comment ne plus vous laisser influencer par votre environnement, Comment ne plus vous laisser influencer par votre corps, vos habitudes et vos émotions, Comment ne plus vous laisser influencer par le temps, Comment passer d’un état de survie/ de stress à un état de création, Comment accéder aux trois zones du cerveau, qui vous permettent de passer de la Pensée à l’Action, jusqu’à un nouvel état d’Être, et comment utiliser à la zone du cerveau de la réussite et de la prospérité, le lobe frontal, chef d’orchestre de la réussite et de la prospérité, Comment modifier vos ondes cérébrales pour une performance optimisée, Comment concevoir et dessiner la nouvelle version de vous même dans la réussite, Comment créer votre plan personnel de 30 jours pour maitriser ces connaissances. Si vous souhaitez initier un changement dans votre vie, alors ce séminaire est pour vous. Vous ferez l’expérience d’un programme utilisé par de nombreux leaders et des milliers de personnes à travers le monde pour créer un changement réussi et durable. Contacts: Agnès Glaise: agnesg@neurochangesolutions.com Antoine Remazeilles: antoineR@neurochangesolutions.com Conditions d'annulation: - 21 jours avant le début de l’évènement : 0% de frais, les arrhes vous sont restitués. - Entre 21 jours et 7 jours avant le début de l’évènement : vous avez la possibilité de transférer votre inscription sur un autre séminaire NCS en France (10 inscrits minimum pour que l’évènement ait lieu). - A partir de 7 jours avant le début de l’évènement : pas de remboursement.
Title: SÉMINAIRE "CHANGEZ VOS HABITUDES, CRÉEZ VOTRE RÉUSSITE" DU DR JOE DISPENZA
Subtitle: La méthode scientifique et exclusive du Dr. Joe Dispenza afin d'atteindre ses objectifs personnels et professionnels tout en s'épanouissant.

Description: Información del evento: 📅 ¿ Cuándo es? → El 09 y 10 de Marzo. 📌 ¿ Dónde es? → "Forum Evolución" | P.º Sierra de Atapuerca, 09002 Burgos 🕑 ¿ Cuál es el horario? → Sábado de 11h a 20h | Domingo de 11h a 18h. ¿ Qué voy a encontrarme? 👔 Una increíble selección de prendas únicas y de calidad clasificadas por nosotros. 🍂 Una amplia variedad de tamaños y estilos adaptados a cada temporada. 💲Un precio único de 35€/kilo: no hay compra mínima. Por ejemplo, una bufanda de 100 gramos costará solamente 3,50€. 🆕 Nuevas prendas durante toda la venta. (Recuerda dejar todo como lo encontraste para que podamos dedicarnos a reponer los percheros con ropa nueva ) ¿ Cómo funciona? ⌛ Reserva tu franja horaria (GRATIS). Por favor, respétala. 🤯 Ven al evento y descubre decenas de percheros clasificadas por categorías. Exponemos más de 100 categorías de ropa y accesorios y más de 10.000 prendas diferentes. ⚖️ Pesa tus artículos en las balanzas que hay repartidas por las salas para que puedas comprobar el precio de tus artículos antes de pasar por caja (recuerda que no hay peso mínimo). 🪞Comprueba cómo te quedan las joyitas que hayas encontrado en nuestros probadores. 😉 ¿ Qué significa una venta Rethink? 💫 Rethink significa promover la moda ética y responsable gracias a dar una segunda vida a la ropa. 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Nuestra misión es democratizarla para que se convierta en algo accesible para todos. Es por esto que organizamos ventas efímeras de ropa vintage y segunda mano (por kilos) en las principales ciudades de Francia y España. 🌱 Con nuestro enfoque, queremos ayudar tanto a las personas, como al medioambiente. La industria textil de hoy en día tiene un gran impacto negativo en nuestro mundo, ¡cambiemos juntos nuestra forma de consumir! ¡Síguenos en nuestras redes sociales! Instagram: @rethinkvintagees Facebook: @rethinkvintagees ⚠️ Importante: Reserve sólo una plaza para cada persona, las demás serán eliminadas automáticamente. C ada entrada permite entrar en la franja horaria seleccionada y permanecer dentro del evento el tiempo que desees. Pero por favor, respete la franja elegida.
Title: Mercado Ropa Vintage - Burgos
Subtitle: El mayor mercado de ropa y accesorios vintage y segunda mano llega a Burgos el 09 y 10 de marzo. ¡Reserva ya tu entrada gratis!

Description: Fecha: 9 de marzo de 2024 a las 21:00 h.Lugar: Los Bancos de Atrás (Pérez Galdós, 2, Unquera)
Title: Kruddö + Trasmoth (Unquera)
Subtitle: ️Próximo AKELARRE de Trasmoth (Madrid) y Kruddö (País Vasco)️ en Los Bancos de Atrás (Unquera)
